data.name: Carnage
data.description: An insane brawler that viciously tears through foes with negative effects, attacking more frequently as their health decreases.

starItems.name: Carnage
starItems.description: An insane brawler that viciously tears through foes with negative effects, attacking more frequently as their health decreases.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from primary target to secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade: Spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from primary target to secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. If the primary target has a negative effect, Chain to <color=#86e619>1-2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + spread <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from the primary target to secondary targets.

This will not spread Stun.
Counterattack breaks this Chain.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per negative effect on the primary target

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per negative effect on the primary target

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> additional damage per negative effect. Remove all negative effects from the primary target. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing to primary target
If the primary target is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>. If the primary target is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. If the primary target is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. If the primary target is above <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply an additional <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

1.description: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies + heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade: Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies + heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>15%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies + heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies + heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>25%</color> Health, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color> for self and all <color=#fff568>SYMBIOTE</color> allies + heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
